Hi.

https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_log_config.html#formats
says:
%a 	Client IP address and port of the request.

but it seems to be ONLY the address... not the port...

And I guess the same will apply for:
%{c}a 	Underlying peer IP address and port of the connection (see the mod_remoteip module).


Cheers,
Chris.

text: Thanks for the report, I removed the port references and added a mod_remoteip reference to %a.
